metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8393 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.28, is vulnerable to a global buffer over-read error because of an assumption made by code that runs for objcopy and strip, that SHT_REL/SHR_RELA sections are always named starting with a .rel/.rela prefix. This vulnerability causes programs that conduct an analysis of binary programs using the libbfd library, such as objcopy and strip, to crash.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Manh-Dung Nguyen, Marcel BÃ¶hme, and Van-Thuan Pham

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
